name: Disney's The Jungle Book: Rhythm n'Groove
name_original: Disney's The Jungle Book: Rhythm n'Groove
description: The Jungle Book Groove Party (The Jungle Book Rhythm N'Groove in North America) is a music rhythm video game developed by Ubi Soft Montreal and Ubi Soft Shanghai for the PlayStation and PlayStation 2. Featuring similar gameplay to the Dance Dance Revolution series, the game features characters and songs from Disney's The Jungle Book. The game was packaged with a dance pad.
